item.title: Software
item.description: C++ vinecopulib: A C++ library for vine copulas RcppThread: R-friendly threading in C++ wdm: Efficient implementation of weighted dependence measures and related independence tests R rvinecopulib: R interface to the vinecopulib C++ library VineCopula: Statistical inference of vine copulas wdm: R interface to the wdm C++ library kde1d: Univariate kernel density estimators for bounded and discrete data vinereg: D-vine copula quantile regression kdecopula: Kernel smoothing for bivariate copula densities
